languages.text: "Чтобы хвастаться на раутах перед Винтерскейлом? Не выйдет — ко мне прилагается целая станция. Она обеспечивает меня энергией, а внизу покоятся громоздкие вычислительные модули. Такова цена того, что ты можешь вести со мной светские беседы".

"So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы хвастаться на раутах перед Винтерскейлом? Не выйдет — ко мне прилагается целая станция. Она обеспечивает меня энергией, а внизу покоятся громоздкие вычислительные модули. Такова цена того, что ты можешь вести со мной светские беседы".

traits.locale_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. That is the price of you being able to make small talk with me."

"So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. That is the price of you being able to make small talk with me."

"So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

"So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

"So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

"So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

languages.text: «¿Para alardear de él ante Winterscale en los banquetes? Mala suerte: hay toda una estación unida a mí. Me proporciona electricidad y, además, hay unos módulos computacionales gigantescos bajo ella. Todo eso para que puedas charlar conmigo».
languages.original_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Para alardear de él ante Winterscale en los banquetes? Mala suerte: hay toda una estación unida a mí. Me proporciona electricidad y, además, hay unos módulos computacionales gigantescos bajo ella. Todo eso para que puedas charlar conmigo».

languages.text: “然后呢？你就可以在宴会上和温特斯凯尔吹嘘了吗？那你还真是不太走运，因为我的身上拖着整座星站。我的能量都是从这座星站来的，庞大的计算模块都藏在下面——这就是‘闲聊’这个功能的开销。”
languages.original_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

traits.locale_text: “然后呢？你就可以在宴会上和温特斯凯尔吹嘘了吗？那你还真是不太走运，因为我的身上拖着整座星站。我的能量都是从这座星站来的，庞大的计算模块都藏在下面——这就是‘闲聊’这个功能的开销。”

languages.text: 「では、あなたは宴会でウィンタースケールにそのことを自慢できたのか？残念だったな。ステーション全体が私に接続されている。それは私に力を供給し、巨大な計算モジュールが下にある。それが、私とのわずかな会話であなたが支払うことになる対価だ」
languages.original_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

traits.locale_text: 「では、あなたは宴会でウィンタースケールにそのことを自慢できたのか？残念だったな。ステーション全体が私に接続されている。それは私に力を供給し、巨大な計算モジュールが下にある。それが、私とのわずかな会話であなたが支払うことになる対価だ」

languages.text: "Um bei Banketten vor Winterzunder mit mir zu prahlen? Da muss ich Euch enttäuschen ... mit mir ist eine ganze Station verbunden. Sie versorgt mich mit Energie und verfügt über riesige Rechenmodule. Das ist der Preis, damit Ihr mit mir plaudern könnt."
languages.original_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

traits.locale_text: "Um bei Banketten vor Winterzunder mit mir zu prahlen? Da muss ich Euch enttäuschen ... mit mir ist eine ganze Station verbunden. Sie versorgt mich mit Energie und verfügt über riesige Rechenmodule. Das ist der Preis, damit Ihr mit mir plaudern könnt."

languages.text: « Pour pouvoir vous afficher à mes côtés aux banquets des Winterscale ? Malheureusement pour vous, je suis indissociable de cette station. Elle m'alimente en énergie, et d'immenses modules de calculs sont installés dans ses profondeurs. Tel est le prix à payer pour avoir le privilège de bavarder avec moi. »
languages.original_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

traits.locale_text: « Pour pouvoir vous afficher à mes côtés aux banquets des Winterscale ? Malheureusement pour vous, je suis indissociable de cette station. Elle m'alimente en énergie, et d'immenses modules de calculs sont installés dans ses profondeurs. Tel est le prix à payer pour avoir le privilège de bavarder avec moi. »

languages.text: "Ziyafetlerinde Winterscalelere hava atmak için mi? Hiç heveslenme. Koca bir istasyon bana bağlı. Bana güç sağlıyor ve altımda kavramsayar modülleri yatıyor. Benimle havadan sudan konuşabilmenin bedeli bu işte."
languages.original_text: "So you could brag about it to Winterscale at banquets? You are out of luck — there is an entire station attached to me. It supplies me with power, and massive computing modules lie below. Such is the price that you might make small talk with me."

traits.locale_text: "Ziyafetlerinde Winterscalelere hava atmak için mi? Hiç heveslenme. Koca bir istasyon bana bağlı. Bana güç sağlıyor ve altımda kavramsayar modülleri yatıyor. Benimle havadan sudan konuşabilmenin bedeli bu işte."
